filelimitbody_compo.title_p10: Supported file types and file sizes.

headtext_compo.title_p2: For Image type projects, it is recommended to upload one model or video at a time.
headtext_compo.title_p3: The size of the model or video can affect the processing time and the smoothness of the project's performance.

goodimageAr_compo.title_p1: High-quality images for use in AR.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p2: Images with distinctive details and clear image features make object detection for display easier and faster.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p4: Hardware Acceleration must be enabled before processing image markers.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p6: What kind of images are easy to detect?
goodimageAr_compo.title_p7: Images should have distinct, clear objects that do not blend into the background.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p8: It is not recommended to use images with text as prominent features. If you need to include text in the image, ensure that the image itself is more prominent than the existing text.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p9: It's advisable to use high-resolution images with accurate color contrast. From the image, it can be seen that we recommend using images with complete color accuracy.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p10: When using images with repeated objects, it's advisable to select images where one of the objects stands out, creating a distinctive feature for detection.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p11: The scattering of objects that makes detection difficult should be minimized. Images should have a clear boundary for detecting larger, less scattered objects.
goodimageAr_compo.title_p12: The ideal aspect ratio for images is 1:1, which is the most suitable. However, other ratios like 3:2, 2:3, and 16:9 work well too. Images with tall aspect ratios may make object detection less efficient.
